definition: local currency/our own currency/abbr. to 本幣|本币
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Article 30 The Company adopts the Chinese Renminbi ("RMB") as its accounts keeping unit.
sentences.chinese: 第三十條合營公司採用人民幣爲記帳的本位貨幣。

sentences.english: The official currency of a country (or a non-country economy) e. g. Yuan-based renminbi is the official currency of china.
sentences.chinese: 不同國家規定的本位貨幣標準是不同的。

sentences.english: The standards for basic unit of a national currency vary by country.
sentences.chinese: 不同國家規定的本位貨幣標準是不同的。
